title: Coal Power
brief_description: Includes “Power from the Valley”, outlining the process of brown coal mining in the La Trobe Valley and its eventual consumption in a turbine generator. (12 min) “Demolition of Yallourn Briquette Chimney” looks at the demolition of the historic briquette production plant at yallourn. Directed by Jim Hayes. (4 min) “The Timeless Force” is a history of the harnessing of energy and its eventual application by the SEC. Gives a history of the SEC’s early years. This film narrated by John Stanton. (29 min)
